nodes.text: The mother of New Republic Security Bureau officer Sela Trune was a female individual who resided on the Trune family farm on Yungbrii. Trune was close with her mother, and found it difficult to leave to join the New Republic. Less than a month later, Trune's family, including her mother, father, and brother Gaithel, were killed during a skirmish between New Republic officers and members of the Spice Runners of Kijimi.
